Package za.co.entelect.challenge.botutils

Class Checker

java.lang.Object
za.co.entelect.challenge.botutils.Checker
Direct Known Subclasses:
FinalActionChecker, FixActionChecker, GoActionChecker, PickUpActionChecker, SpecialActionChecker, UseActionChecker
public abstract class Checker extends Object
Checker is an abstract action checker that checks an action using ObstacleDetector, PowerUpDetector, PositionDetector, and both player's Car information.

    • use

      public void use(Detector detector)

    • is

      public abstract Checker is(Action action)
      Attaches an action to the Checker to check.
      Parameters:
      action - action to check
      Returns:
      this Checker containing the action

    • feasible

      public abstract boolean feasible()
      Checks whether the action to check is feasible or not. Must be called only after calling is() method.
      Returns:
      true if the action to check is feasible, false otherwise

    • execute

      public Command execute()
      Executes the actionToDo based on checked feasible action. Must be called only after calling feasible() method, otherwise may perform an unexpected behavior.
      Returns:
      the command to execute in the game
